setting.location: Public park on Warsaw outskirts, Congress Poland, with well-maintained paths diverging through wooded area

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, dark hair disheveled, intense inner struggle visible in posture
characters.clothing: Business suit somewhat rumpled, coat unbuttoned, hat in hand
characters.position: Standing exactly where two paths diverge
characters.action: Looking back and forth between paths, one foot planted on each direction

scene.mainElements: Man alone at literal crossroads in park, two distinct paths visible - one leading uphill toward lights of prosperous district, other descending into darker wooded area
scene.details: Wooden signpost with two directional arrows at path junction, left path wide and well-maintained leading upward toward warm lamp lights visible through trees, right path narrow and overgrown descending into shadowy forest, gravel crunching under his feet, dropped glove on ground behind him, no text or letters visible
scene.background: City lights beginning to glow in distance up left path, dark forest depths down right path, last rays of sunset through clouds
scene.atmosphere: Physical manifestation of life choice, the moment of decision between continuing social climbing or abandoning worldly ambitions

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot from behind showing man and both path options
composition.focus: The merchant's position literally between two paths
composition.depth: Man at crossroads in foreground, diverging paths in middle, contrasting destinations in background
